item.title: Experience CODERS only
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

ill pitch in,
if you want to make a shop, use THIS format:

shop = SHOP NUMBER[tab]SHOP_NAME	[tab]			1[tab]	1[tab]	ITEM ID[tab]	AMOUNT[tab]	ITEM ID[tab]	AMOUNT[tab]	( you can addmore stoof  )

use _ for spaces

now if you want to add an npc, use this format:

spawn = NPC ID[tab]X COARD[tab]Y COARD[tab]0[tab]0[tab]0[tab]0[tab]0[tab]2[tab]DESCRIPTION

the 0s are his walking area, if you want the npc to stand still leave it at 0. the 2 is his walk type… jus leave that alone as that doesnt matter anywho.

if you DO want him to walk around, fill in the 0’s with the corosponding X-Y coards within the range you want him to walk in.

NOTE: sorry to inturupt your little fight XD

Read full topic

item.title: Experience CODERS only
item.dc:creator: @hmpph hmpph
item.description:
@hmpph wrote:

awesom:

LOL… Another thing it is actually a rule to use proper spelling and grammar…and most of what you say doesn’t make sense…

I don’t see a no offense, so this is obdviosly a flame idiot…

[quote=“dragonus18, post:9, topic:127775”][quote author=hmpph link=topic=178412.msg1633218#msg1633218 date=1185623540]

Seriously go to www.google.com and learn some basics before even trying then.
When I started I downloaded a source and picked most stuff up very fast by looking in client.java and trying to add stuff from tutorials. Then just ended up recognizing things.

PS. You kinda need a brain to figure stuff out. No offense but by your topics I’ve seen you seem slow so maybe you should just stick to going on other peoples servers.

How many more posts does this guy need to make so you guys will give him a break…
Hes asking for help ffs all you guys care about is Flame/Spam its really pathetic.

Davon I’ll PM you if you need help, but like Sick of Air said, its best for you to download a source and edit the client, so go to that first, PM me if you need some more help with it and ill help ya out.
[/quote]

wow, i don’t think you could help him seeing as you said to downloads the source and edit the client you dumbass you edit the server not the client[/quote]
